content:
{"name": "x_ai_career_post", "type": "document", "content": "**Main X Post (Hook + Call for Engagement):**

Two years unemployed. Nothing has worked. So I’m turning to AI—and to you—for help.  

Ray Kurzweil predicted AI would surpass human intelligence by 2029. The CEO of NVIDIA just said companies no longer need junior and mid-level coders. Y Combinator’s latest investment targets are **almost exclusively AI replacing white-collar jobs.**

This isn’t five years from now—it’s happening **right now.**

I asked AI: "What should I do?"  
The answer was **not what I expected.**

🧵 Read on to see how AI is guiding my next move—and how you can help.

---

**1️⃣ The AI Takeover Is Accelerating**

Kurzweil originally predicted the **Singularity** would happen by 2045, but he’s since **moved up his prediction to 2029.**

Meanwhile, Jensen Huang, CEO of NVIDIA, says companies **no longer need entry-level programmers** because AI can now do the work. 

And Y Combinator’s 2025 investment list? **AI replacing white-collar work at scale.**

This isn’t a distant future—it’s unfolding in **real time.**

---

**2️⃣ I Tried Everything—And It Wasn’t Enough**

- I followed **all** the job search best practices. No success.  
- I upskilled—learning **SQL, Tableau, data analytics.** But AI can already do 80-90% of those jobs.  
- I kept networking. Still nothing.  

So I stopped assuming humans had the answers. **I asked AI: "What should I do?"**

---

**3️⃣ AI’s Answer? A 3-Part Plan**

1️⃣ **Learn AI automation & implementation** to help companies integrate AI.
2️⃣ **Use AI to optimize my own job search** & publicly document the process.
3️⃣ **Monetize my dog on social media.** Yes, really. (I know this sounds crazy—but check out the video below.)

---

**4️⃣ The AI-Powered Experiment Begins**

Rather than resisting AI, **I’m letting it dictate my next career move.**  

I’ll be sharing:
- **AI-powered job search automation & outreach.**
- **AI replacing & enhancing traditional business processes.**
- **Experiments with AI-driven content growth.**

---

**5️⃣ How You Can Help**

✅ **Engage with this post** (Like, Comment, Share—helps reach the right people.)
✅ **Know AI-driven roles?** Let’s talk. (I specialize in **AI adoption, automation, GTM strategy, and process optimization.**)
✅ **Follow along** as I document this **AI-driven career experiment.**
✅ **And if you love dogs,** follow Chewy on TikTok & Instagram. (Links in comments.)

---

💬 What’s the most unexpected way AI has impacted your life or work? Let’s discuss."}
